page.title: 19Ghost and Mystery stories
page.content:
The Mystery of the Grave In Penkridge Church yard on one of the oldest graves is a black skull and cross bones. It is said that if you go round it eight times you go to hell.
The "Boat Inn" Ghost In this pub a ghost keeps on appearing and leaves little toy soldiers. This ghost has never been seen.
The Monk "Church Cottage" is the setting for a Monk's walk. The Monk walks up the stairs then disappears through a wall.
Bodyless Head The head of a girl called Anit Brizten haunts the main road by Dunston Bridge.
